oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names of three Bushmen and another Native, who were at the Breakwater Convict Station in 1875, together with a little information regarding them. Taken down in English (L V.-19. 5445-5447, 5453-5456). =gerri-sse (Jan Ronebout) provides Lloyd with some personal details and the names of his closest relations (his mother, father and older brother Hendrik, who was also imprisoned at the Breakwater Convict Station). =gerri-sse's mother (!kwarra-an) was from ||kabbo's country and 'understood greatly'.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jan Ronebout or =gerri-sse (at Breakwater and later at Mowbray)
